item.title: Go Home Annie for PC launches December 3
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/go-home-annie-for-pc-launches-december-3

  • PC

Console release also planned.

SCP-inspired first-person horror investigation game Go Home Annie launch for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG on December 3, followed by unspecified consoles at a later date, publisher Nordcurrent Labs and developer Misfit Village announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nordcurrent Labs:

About

Take on the role of Annie, a low level employee of the SCP Foundation, A covert organization meant to secure and contain anomalous entities and protect the general public.

Why has an organization with the motto ‚ÄúSecure, Contain, Protect‚Äù created a division for replicating dangerous paranormal events and anomalous entities? Why are you tasked with repeatedly testing the same replicas, with a seemingly never changing outcome? You will need to take drastic actions to uncover your true purpose and alter the course of your fate.

Experience a weird first person horror experience.

Key Features

  • Twisted Gameplay Mechanics ‚Äì Utilize existing and original anomalies to solve puzzles and navigate levels.
  • Explore Every Corner of the Mysterious Facility ‚Äì from terrifying experiments, to loose subjects, no place in the Replication Division is completely safe.
  • An Original Take on the SCP Universe ‚Äì If you‚Äôre familiar with the stories of the SCP Foundation, you might find Go Home Annie has made surprising changes to them. Besides the most popular ones, you will meet and interact with many hidden gems of the SCP Foundation Wiki.

item.title: Bye Sweet Carole ‚ÄòMidnight‚Äô trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/bye-sweet-carole-midnight-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Latest look at the animated horror game.

Publisher Maximum Entertainment and developer Little Sewing Machine have released a new trailer for animated horror game Bye Sweet Carole. Dubbed ‚ÄúMidnight,‚Äù the trailer introduces new gameplay and the awful owl Velenia.

Here is an overview of the game, via Just For Games:

About

Bye Sweet Carole is a horrific thriller game inspired by the greatest animation movies and created by Chris Darril. Be ready to jump into the world of Corolla and meet the rabbits that has infested it.

Young Lana Benton, urged by the terrifying Mr. Kyn, also known as ‚ÄúOld Hat,‚Äù finds herself catapulted into a mysterious enchanted garden to deal with menacing and disturbing creatures. After discovering a number of letters from a certain ‚ÄúFrench,‚Äù Lana decides to follow the last known trail of Carole Simmons, a girl of the same age who apparently escaped from Bunny Hall, an orphanage in the nineteenth century. The building is now infested by colony of wild rabbits able to open a dimensional portal to the realm of Corolla‚Ä¶

Key Features

  • Embark on a horrific journey through a dark tale set in the mesmerizing world of Corolla.
  • Immerse yourself in a hand-drawn universe brought to life using cinematographic technique inspired by the greatest animated movies.
  • Encounter a vibrant cast of characters, from your loyal friend M. Beasie to the malevolent owl Velenia and the terrifying M. Kyn.
  • Shape-shift into a rabbit and harness your various forms to conquer the deadly challenge that await you.

Bye Sweet Carole is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2025.

item.title: Love Eternal ‚Äì The Indie Horror Showcase 2024 trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/love-eternal-the-indie-horror-showcase-2024-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Side-scrolling horror platformer due out in 2025.

Publisher Ysbryd Games and developer brlka have released a new trailer for side-scrolling horror platformer Love Eternal as part of The Indie Horror Showcase 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Ysbyrd Games:

About

Run, jump, and reverse the flow of gravity itself to escape the mind of a selfish god in this challenging precision platformer. Play as Maya, a child stolen from her family on the whim of a lonely, forsaken deity, and make your way through over 100 screens filled with spikes, lasers, switches, and traps as you unravel the horrifying secret of your new prison.

Key Featuers

  • Gorgeous hand-drawn pixel art graphics bring the god‚Äôs realm to life alongside meticulously handcrafted animations boasting many thousands of frames.
  • A lush, atmospheric score, equal parts unsettling and beautiful.
  • Responsive, snappy controls provide challenges with a sense of mastery and acrobatic accomplishment.
  • A psychological horror narrative contorts and unfolds to reveal choices beyond comprehension.

Love Eternal is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2025.

item.title: Arken Age launches January 16, 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/arken-age-launches-january-16-2025

  • PC
  • PS VR2
  • PS5

Virtual reality action adventure game dated.

Virtual reality action adventure game Arken Age will launch for PlayStation VR2 and SteamVR on January 16, 2025, developer VitruviusVR announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via VitruviusVR:

About

Arken Age is a virtual reality action adventure game set in the Bio-Chasm‚Äîa terraformed fantasy world created by the Grand Arborist. Engage in full physics-based combat using Arkenite infused swords and guns‚Äîand freely explore the densely filled environments under siege by Hyperion‚Äôs neural corruption.

Key Features

  • Physics Combat ‚Äì Shoot, dismember, and crush enemies in fast paced, full physics combat.
  • Build Virtual Reality Weaponry ‚Äì Equip yourself with three fully customizable Hyperion weapons and explore the Bio-Chasm to find 30 unique mods.
  • Full Virtual Body ‚Äì You are a biological alien weapon; built with full locomotion, and the ability to freely jump, climb, and swim.
  • Climbing ‚Äì Nothing is out of reach with your integrated climbing picks, used to traverse the twisted roots of the Bio-Chasm.
  • Crafting and Refining ‚Äì Create your own Scarlet Nectar syringes, smelt scrap metal into Hyperion Alloy, and craft custom weaponry.
  • Exploration ‚Äì The Bio-Chasm is filled with items to collect, unique life forms to befriend, and endless danger at every corner.
  • Story and Characters ‚Äì Immerse yourself in the culture of the Nara race and uncover the secrets of the Grand Arborist and Celestial Custodian.
  • Epic Boss Fights ‚Äì Put all your weapons to the test in multi-stage custom virtual reality boss fights.
  • Campaign and Replay ‚Äì Arken Age has over 10 hours of campaign and includes an endless combat mode for unlimited replayability.

item.title: Metafictional horror game Among Ashes adds PS5 version, launches in December
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/metafictional-horror-game-among-ashes-adds-ps5-version-launches-in-december

  • PC
  • PS5

A game within a game.

Metafictional horror game Among Ashes will launch for PlayStation 5 via PlayStation Store and PC via Steam in December, developer Rat Cliff Games announced. The PC version is self-published by Rat Cliff Games, while the newly announced PlayStation 5 version will be published by Dojo System.

Here is an overview of the game, via Rat Cliff Games:

Among Ashes is a metafictional horror title about a haunted video game and the disturbing story behind its creation. It‚Äôs a stormy night in the early 2000s and your friend has sent you a link to ‚ÄúNight Call,‚Äù a horror game that he found online. As you play, strange things start happening in your apartment. Something is terribly wrong with the game.

Among Ashes features an innovative, meta-framing device in which players will experience a full retro-inspired first-person survival horror game within another first-person horror game, in addition to a host of unique presentational touches, surprises, mechanics and puzzles that transport players back to the turn of the millennium‚Äîproviding a terrifying dose of nostalgia in the process.

In the retro-styled survival-horror ‚ÄúNight Call,‚Äù players will explore Stoker manor; solving puzzles and fighting off the nightmarish creatures that have infested its labyrinthian halls. In the real world, however, they‚Äôll be haunted by the dark entities that have latched on to this strange game, as they frantically try to unravel the mystery behind the game and its enigmatic creator.

Whatever you do‚Ä¶ KEEP PLAYING.

item.title: The Thing: Remastered ‚ÄòGameplay‚Äô trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/the-thing-remastered-gameplay-trailer

Nightdive Studios has released the first gameplay trailer for remastered third-person shooter The Thing: Remastered.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nightdive Studios:

About

The Thing: Remastered is a faithful restoration of the cult-classic 2002 third-person survival horror shooter game inspired by Universal Pictures and filmmaker John Carpenter‚Äôs genre-defining 1982 film, The Thing. Nightdive Studios has upgraded this horrifying classic for the modern era through its proprietary KEX Engine for play on current-generation gaming devices up to a 4K resolution at 120FPS. Improvements to character models, textures, and animations have been hand-crafted by Nightdive Studios, with the implementation of advanced 3D rendering for updated lighting and atmospheric effects‚Äîfor a suspenseful and disgustingly detailed remaster that reanimates the thrilling game for modern audiences.

In the frozen arctic tundra, a mysterious shape-shifting alien has wiped out the crew of the U.S. Outpost #31 research facility. In The Thing: Remastered, players step into the boots of Captain J.F. Blake, the leader of a United States Army Special Forces rescue team sent to investigate the blood-curdling events that transpired in the original The Thing film. Trapped by the elements and at risk of infection by a horrific entity, Blake must keep his squad together to survive by gaining their trust and ensuring that their fear and paranoia don‚Äôt get the best of them‚Ä¶ or himself.

Key Features

  • Return to U.S. Outpost #31 ‚Äì Continue the story of The Thing and face off against terrifying monsters, from scuttling head-spiders and human-like walkers to gigantic multi-tentacled level bosses.
  • Who Goes There? ‚Äì Command a squad of up to four NPCs from Soldier, Medic, and Engineer character classes through the game‚Äôs 11 frightening levels.
  • The Warmest Place to Hide ‚Äì Someone in your squad may not be who they appear to be. The shape-shifting alien hides inside an imitation, so keep a watchful eye.
  • Don‚Äôt Lose It ‚Äì Gain the trust of your squad members and minimize their fear levels lest they become defiant or, worse, succumb to paranoia.
  • Ultimate Alien Terror ‚Äì Upgraded models, textures, and animations hand-crafted by Nightdive, plus enhanced lighting and atmospheric effects.
  • Stunning Visuals ‚Äì Up to 4K 120 frames per second visuals on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.
  • Checkmate ‚Äì Trophies and Achievements on Windows PC via Steam, PlayStation, and Xbox consoles.

The Thing: Remastered is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and GOG in 2024.

Watch the trailer below.
